name: At the Edge of Time
description:
This game was made by NicplayCrasher (coding), EvolvedMonke (me, Idea leader and coding), jam(music), Owen(art). If you have any problems feel free to say it in the comments! PS: while opening the game if you get an error message just know that is normal, the game will run even with it.

Honorable mentions to Jam for making the music, unfortunately the music doesn't work in the game because of a bug that we can't solve. But soon we will publish the music on youtube so if you want you will be able to listen to it! (When we will upload the music we will give here a link to it)
